scripts.coverage: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -o src/ src/ && ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -o test/ test/ && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report html -- -R spec -t 3000 -s 2000
scripts.coveralls: ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -o src/ src/ && ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -o test/ test/ && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec -t 3000 -s 2000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls
